preface.title: About This Manual
preface.para: This manual offers an introduction to setting up and managing virtualization with &kvm; (Kernel-based Virtual Machine), &xen;, and Linux Containers (LXC) on &productname;. The first part introduces the different virtualization solutions by describing their requirements, their installations and &suse;'s support status. The second part deals with managing &vmguest;s and &vmhost;s with &libvirt;. The following parts describe various administration tasks and practices and the last three parts deal with hypervisor-specific topics.
